name: Cardkin
description:
This game is made for Ludum Dare 46 Compo with theme "Keep it alive"

You have a Deckling and you need to give it stuff from your bag to keep it happy, clean, rested, and healthy. If only you can figure out what these weird stuff in your backpack does.

Make sure you don't run out of items! Sell stuff you think you don't want and buy more items from the store to fill up your backpack.
